jmarkov.jqbd.solvers

Class QBDPhaseSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmarkov.jqbd.solvers.QBDPhaseSolver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLPAlgorithm, ModBoundSolverFromMatrix, MtjLogRedSolverFromMatrix

    public abstract class QBDPhaseSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is abstrac and inplements the mathods necesaries to compute the performance measures for a PHPH1 model and generate the caracteristic matrix from it.
    Author:
    Andrés Sarmiento Romero

      • initilicePHPH1

        public void initilicePHPH1(PhaseVar arrivals,
                  PhaseVar service)
        This method computes the 6 QBD caracteristic matrices using the interarrival and service PH distributions
        Parameters:
        arrivals - PH that represents the inter-arrival times
        service - PH that represents the service times
